content:
advertisement

Though National Coming Out Day will be celebrated across the country today those in Penn States lesbian gay bisexual and transgender LGBT community will postpone their celebration until Homecoming weekend PERIOD

The goal of National Coming Out Day is to encourage gay lesbian bisexual and transgender Americans to talk to their families and friends about their lives PERIOD

Its celebrated every Oct PERIOD  to mark the anniversary of the  march on Washington D.C PERIOD for gay and lesbian rights and has been commemorated every year since by thousands of people across the country PERIOD

This years theme for National Coming Out Day is  The theme is being adopted for Penn States celebration as well and is being manifested in a number of activities planned for the weekend PERIOD

On Oct PERIOD  speaker Billy Bean a former professional baseball player will kick off the celebration with his message about what its like to be gay and in the closet in professional baseball along with his views about the LGBT climate in athletics PERIOD

The weekends main event is scheduled for Oct PERIOD  PERIOD At noon a rally will be held on the steps of Old Main encouraging students to come forward and come out of the closet in a supportive atmosphere PERIOD

 Allies President Christy Merchant said PERIOD 

Although part of the weekends theme is to encourage the LGBT community to vote nature of the rally is not solely focused on politics PERIOD

The Undergraduate Student Governments Lesbian Gay Bisexual Transgender and their Allies affairs director Jamie Ziegenfuss said pertinent issues such as visibility will be addressed at the rally PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

However in the period before the Nov PERIOD  election certain political issues will play an active part in the rally PERIOD

 Allies political director Ian Thompson said PERIOD 

Thompson communicated the necessity of political education at the rally with the fact that in  states it is still legal to fire employees based on sexual orientation PERIOD It is also the first election that there has been an investment in reaching out not only to the LGBT community but also to LGBT youth PERIOD

Ultimately the goal for this years  weekend at Penn State is to provide an environment for empowerment where one can find his or her voice a network of supportive people and resources to continue development Merchant said PERIOD

It will culminate in a student drag show during Late Night Penn State at  p.m PERIOD Oct PERIOD  in HUB Alumni Hall PERIOD

 Thompson said PERIOD
